articles.author: HT Entertainment Desk
articles.title: Waheeda Rehman to be honoured with Dadasaheb Phalke Lifetime Achievement award, Anurag Thakur announces - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Actor Waheeda Rehman is the latest Bollywood actor to get honoured with the prestigious Dadasaheb Phalke award. Last year, it was presented to Asha Parekh.  | Bollywood
articles.content: Ministry of Information and Broadcasting has announced that this year's Dadasaheb Phalke Lifetime Achievement Award recipient will be veteran actor Waheeda Rehman. The legendary actor has worked in f… [+1769 chars]

articles.title: Bengaluru Bandh Today, 200 Protesters Taken Into Custody: 10 Points - NDTV
articles.description: Farmer bodies in Karnataka have called for a Bengaluru bandh today to protest against an order by the Cauvery Water Management Authority (CWMA) to release 5,000 cusecs of water to Tamil Nadu. Another, state-wide, bandh has been called on Friday.
articles.content: <li>Over 200 protesters have been taken into custody for violating prohibitory orders as they were trying to march towards Raj Bhavan from Vidhana Soudha. The march was led by the Chairman of the fed… [+1771 chars]
